import React from "react"; import { FaSpa, FaBrain, FaHeart, FaLeaf, FaSmile, FaBookOpen, FaCloudSun } from "react-icons/fa"; const Learn = () => { return (

🌿 Mental Wellness & Mindfulness Guide

Discover powerful techniques and knowledge to strengthen your mental health, manage stress, and live a balanced life.

{/* Mindfulness */}

Mindfulness Practice

Mindfulness means focusing on the present moment without judgment. Practice daily with mindful breathing, mindful eating, and nature walks to reduce anxiety and improve focus.

  • ✨ 5-Minute Morning Mindfulness
  • ✨ Body Scan Relaxation
  • ✨ Gratitude Journaling
{/* Meditation */}

Meditation Techniques

Meditation is a powerful tool to improve mental clarity, reduce stress, and promote emotional health. Start with guided meditations or breathing exercises.

  • 🧘‍♂️ Guided Meditation Apps
  • 🧘 Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)
  • 🧘 Visualization Exercises
{/* Stress Management */}

Stress Management

Learn healthy ways to cope with stress. Avoid bottling up emotions and use tools like music, journaling, and creative hobbies.

  • 🎵 Music & Art Therapy
  • 📔 Emotional Journaling
  • 🌿 Spending Time in Nature
{/* Yoga & Breathing */}

Yoga & Breathing

Yoga enhances flexibility, reduces anxiety, and improves body-mind connection. Combine with pranayama (breathing exercises) for complete relaxation.

  • 🧘‍♀️ Surya Namaskar
  • 💨 Alternate Nostril Breathing
  • 🕉️ Chanting & Mantras
{/* Positive Affirmations */}

Positive Affirmations

Rewire your thoughts with daily affirmations. Repeating positive statements helps build confidence and reduce negative self-talk.

  • 🌟 "I am calm and in control."
  • 🌟 "I attract positive energy."
  • 🌟 "I am grateful for today."
{/* Books & Learning */}

Books to Read

Knowledge is power. Explore books that nurture your mental resilience:

  • 📖 "The Power of Now" - Eckhart Tolle
  • 📖 "Atomic Habits" - James Clear
  • 📖 "The Untethered Soul" - Michael A. Singer
{/* Self-care & Sunlight */}

Self-Care & Sunlight

Daily self-care routines like morning walks, hydration, and sun exposure enhance Vitamin D levels and uplift mood naturally.

{/* Call to Action */}

Start Your Mental Wellness Journey Today 🌸

Empower your mind and soul with NutriFit-Hub’s guided mental wellness resources.

); }; export default Learn;
